rounds.meaning: A baby is a newly-born human child or animal. As time goes by, they are able to change and grow into adults.
A cloud is a collection of tiny droplets of water that can float in the air. Eventually, the water from clouds form rain.
Drinking water or other beverages helps regulate body temperature. It also provides nutrients and keeps humans and animals hydrated.
Swimming is a movement done by humans and animals that helps them move across water.
Wood is a material collected from trees that can be used for many different furnitures.
